# Release v5.3.2

## Installation

Download the latest release from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/releases).

## Changes

### New Features

- **Recording Safeguards**: Optional confirmation prompt before processing recordings that exceed a configurable duration (1, 2, 5, or 10 minutes). Helps prevent accidental API usage from long or unintended recordings. Applies to all shortcuts (Transcribe, Speech-to-Prompt, Prompt & Read). Configure under General â†’ Recording Safeguards.
- **Rate Limits Link**: Added a link in General Settings to configure rate limits on the Google Cloud console.

### Improvements

- **Default Prompt Model**: Default prompt model and Prompt & Read model updated to Gemini 3 Flash for improved performance and accuracy.
- **Transcription Settings**: Adjusted transcription defaults for better performance.

### Documentation

- **README**: Clarified support options (App Store purchase and review); removed redundant sections and streamlined the document.

## Full Changelog

For a complete list of changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/compare/v5.3.1...v5.3.2).
